rooms.name: Main Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A wide corridor leading from the main entrance to the living areas and kitchen. Designed with minimalistic Scandinavian style using light wood and white walls.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space with a central seating area, abundant natural lighting from large windows on the south side (Vastu compliant) to promote positive energy flow. Scandinavian design features clean lines and functional furniture.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a dining table set up to capture north light, ensuring harmony as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian kitchen designed for functionality and minimalism. Open plan concept with access to a central courtyard on the south side.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A private open space integrated in the middle of the house, fostering natural ventilation and light. Decorated with minimalistic Scandinavian landscaping and water features to enhance Vastu energies.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A private bedroom on the ground floor designed for guests, featuring soft lighting and minimal decor in line with Scandinavian aesthetics. Positioned towards the east to harness morning light.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A small yet functional bathroom attached to the guest bedroom ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Utility Room/Storage
rooms.description: Space for storing cleaning supplies and household items, integrated within the ground floor plan in keeping with Scandinavian minimalism.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large entrance door aligned to face east-west for auspicious energy flow as per Vastu, with Scandinavian design elements.

openings.name: Sliding Glass Doors
openings.description: Large sliding glass doors providing seamless connection between indoor and outdoor spaces while ensuring privacy with frosted glass.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
openings.description: Staircase leading to the rooftop terrace designed for dual access to both ground and upper levels.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with Scandinavian elegance, facing south for abundant natural light and warm Vastu energy. Includes an en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Luxurious en-suite attached to the master bedroom featuring Scandinavian minimalism in fixtures and finishes.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom on first floor with ample storage space and natural light from east-facing windows as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom designed to be compact yet functional; includes built-in wardrobes. Positioned on the north side for balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated private gym with state-of-the-art equipment, natural lighting from windows facing south-east as per Vastu recommendations. Scandinavian design elements ensure a modern look.

rooms.name: Study/Workroom
rooms.description: A quiet workspace with minimalistic design and ample natural light from east-facing windows. Enhances productivity in line with Scandinavian design ethos.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: Modern staircase connecting ground and first floors in a minimalist style with Scandinavian design accents.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: A private balcony overlooking the central courtyard and garden area, ensuring personal space and privacy.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive rooftop terrace serving as a communal outdoor living area with Scandinavian design elements. Features integrated seating areas and greenery to boost relaxation and social interactions.

openings.name: Access Ladder
openings.description: Secured ladder access for safe movement between the first floor and rooftop terrace.
